page.title: 18ROAD SURVEY,TEST VALLEY
page.content: Although this is a rural area,with very few people living here, there is an important crossroads in the area. The main road from Bournemouth to Winchester (A31) crossed the main road from Southampton to Salisbury and Bath (A36).The old crossroads was changed when the new M27 was constructed and a roundabout now takes traffic from Bournemouth to Portsmouth without passing through Southampton. These are busy main roads and there are some dual carriageways.There are still,however,many narrow,winding country lanes which twist between high hedges.Bridleways cross the area, especially near the river,and these are used by riding schools. Although most people living here have cars,there are regular bus services along the main roads.There is a twice weekly shopping service on minor roads
